title: Five-hour power cuts imposed today
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says it has approved the Ceylon Electricity Board’s request to impose power cuts lasting 5 hours today (May 12).
Areas ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW – Five hours between 8.00 a.m. and 11.30 p.m. (three hours and 20 minutes during the daytime and one hour and 40 minutes at night)
